books.author: by E. L. James
books.description: An inexperienced college student falls in love with a tortured man who has particular sexual tastes; the first book in a trilogy.
books.name: FIFTY SHADES OF GREY

books.author: by E. L. James
books.description: Ana Steele learns more about Christian Grey’s troubled past; the second book in a trilogy.
books.name: FIFTY SHADES DARKER

books.author: by E. L. James
books.description: The final book in an erotic trilogy.
books.name: FIFTY SHADES FREED

books.author: by Gillian Flynn
books.description: A woman disappears on the day of her fifth anniversary; is her husband a killer?
books.name: GONE GIRL

books.author: by Sylvia Day
books.description: Two troubled people develop an intense, obsessive relationship.
books.name: BARED TO YOU

books.author: by James Rollins
books.description: A deadly rescue mission in the African jungle and a clinic bombing in South Carolina both reveal a dangerous conspiracy; a Sigma Force novel.
books.name: BLOODLINE

books.author: by Elin Hilderbrand
books.description: The aftereffects of a deadly automobile crash in Nantucket.
books.name: SUMMERLAND

books.author: by E. L. James
books.description: The three “Fifty Shades” novels in one bundle.
books.name: FIFTY SHADES TRILOGY

books.author: by Karen Kingsbury
books.description: The Baxters plan a lakeside reunion, but before the big day, the unthinkable happens, leading to a revelation of secrets.
books.name: COMING HOME

books.author: by Jeaniene Frost
books.description: When a mortal cursed with dark power is set against a vampire, passion ignites, threatening to consume them both.
books.name: ONCE BURNED

books.author: by Susan Mallery
books.description: The horse whisperer Shane Stryker is on the lookout for a woman who wants to lead a quiet ranching life, so the librarian Annabelle Weiss must correct the wrong impression he has formed of her.
books.name: SUMMER NIGHTS

books.author: by Janet Evanovich
books.description: The Salem, Mass., pastry chef Lizzy Tucker and her partner, Diesel, seach for a powerful ancient relic.
books.name: WICKED BUSINESS

books.author: by Dean Koontz
books.description: This story, the third in an e-book series, finds Odd Thomas at a mysterious Pacific Coast motel.
books.name: ODD INTERLUDE #3

books.author: by Seth Grahame-Smith
books.description: A journal reveals Lincoln’s fight against the undead.
books.name: ABRAHAM LINCOLN: VAMPIRE HUNTER

books.author: by Jennifer Probst
books.description: A billionaire who needs a wife offers a one-year marriage in name only to a bookstore owner.
books.name: THE MARRIAGE BARGAIN
